officialTitle: A PILOT Study Evaluating Novel Biomarkers of AKI in Post-operative Patients Undergoing Major Intra-Abdominal Surgery
inclusionCriteria:
* ≥ 18 years
* High risk patients: General Surgery AKI Risk Index Class III, IV or V
* Major abdominal surgery
* Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusionCriteria:
* Ongoing acute kidney injury Stage 2/3
* History of kidney transplant
